department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: uppers beaded overall with predominately white beads; repeating bands with vertical blue squares and white squares with red centers around heel and sides near top, extending into two triangular shaped bands with similar motifs on top of moccasins; repeating red and green conjoined triangles around bottom outer edges; forked tongue beaded in blue and white; red cotton fabric around moccasin openings
title: Pair of moccasins
